I am currently a Linux Support Engineer. Previously, I worked as an Electrical Engineer (then, why Linux? I had a vision, so to speak) in start-up.

I obtained my Bachelor of technology in Electrical from the University of Kerala and Redhat Certifications from Mumbai.

I enjoy writing useful & reusable bash scripts to make task easy — check out my scripts. In the past several years I've become an experienced and an expert in Linux.

I do not usually miss any technical event or gathering. However, I have had the good fortunate to be the part of:
Oracle Bare Metal DBCS Sales Play Workshop - Mumbai
Google Cloud Partner Summit - Mumbai
AWS Technical Essentials Day - Mumbai
Red Hat Boot Camp - Mumbai
AWS Technical Day 2018 - Mumbai
AWS Summit 2018 - Mumbai
Google Summit 2018 - Mumbai

I spend time on DIY projects. Most of my projects are based on Raspberry Pi.
Some of them are:
AdBlocker Router
